tweet: I know Cutler sucked tonight, it was obvious to anyone who watched. But the play calling sucked.  Enjoy the top 15 pick this year Denver.
@Dgentry4 Yeah he is. 5 picks. Wow. I don't know what else to say here.
Chris Williams. Wow. Nothing else to say. Just a stupid, stupid penalty. Lovie's lost this team, that's all there is to it.
I'd say Jay Cutler should be thanking the defense right now... but they've gotten run over a couple times already this year. Miserable team
Jay Cutler has been working closely with his new quarterbacks coach, Rex Grossman. All that hard work's starting to pay off.
